attributes.action: Phase out the narrow speed humps in the middle of roads as these cause dangerous and inconsiderate driving
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are an increasing number of speed humps where 3 narrow humps are fixed in the middle and in the left and right lanes of roads. This appears to entice incosiderate drivers to use the middle humps and in so doing drive down the middle of the road. This can be dangerous and encourages selfish driving.
